Experiment_description: The experiments aimed to establish a baseline for glyph-clustering using a bag-of-characters model implemented in PyTorch, evaluated with metrics such as Color-Weighted Accuracy (CWA), Shape-Weighted Accuracy (SWA), and their harmonic mean (HMWA).
Significance: These experiments are important as they provide a stable and reproducible baseline for glyph-clustering methodologies, essential for future research and enhancements. The consistent performance across nodes builds confidence in the reliability of this baseline.
Description: The experiments utilized a two-layer feed-forward network trained on a bag-of-characters representation of symbolic sequences. The models were evaluated using CWA, SWA, and HMWA metrics to determine their effectiveness at capturing shape and color patterns. The consistent results across different nodes demonstrate the model's stability and readiness for future refinement.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation loss over 10 epochs. Both losses decrease steadily, indicating that the model is learning effectively.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The close alignment of training and validation loss curves suggests good model generalization and effective learning without overfitting.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot presents the weighted accuracies (CWA, SWA, and HMWA) on the validation set across 10 epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: SWA achieving the highest accuracy indicates the model's strength in capturing shape-based patterns consistently across epochs.

List_of_included_plots.description: The confusion matrix for the test set shows a high number of correctly classified instances for both classes.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The diagonal dominance suggests effective classification, though further improvements are possible to reduce misclassifications.

Key_numerical_results.description: Validation color weighted accuracy (CWA) observed in Nodes 9fd226ab2ef64d9284a33288ed9f6473 and ab9e2f80b0a440d593b80cc5b87c64dc.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: The consistency of CWA across multiple nodes indicates reliability in the color pattern recognition capability of the model.

Key_numerical_results.description: Validation shape weighted accuracy (SWA) observed in Nodes 9fd226ab2ef64d9284a33288ed9f6473 and ab9e2f80b0a440d593b80cc5b87c64dc.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: SWA consistently being the highest among metrics highlights the model's effectiveness in capturing shape-based features.

Key_numerical_results.description: Test accuracy observed in Nodes 9fd226ab2ef64d9284a33288ed9f6473 and ab9e2f80b0a440d593b80cc5b87c64dc.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: The test accuracy aligns with validation metrics, reinforcing the model's generalization to unseen data.

Key_numerical_results.description: Test color weighted accuracy (CWA) observed in Node e9befd8717f14ce4b854392680ee3487.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Lower CWA in this node compared to others suggests potential variability due to random initialization or other stochastic factors.
